name: veSync
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
veSync is a community-driven ve(3,3) DEX on zkSync Era. Governance token: veSync($VS). 
veSync($VS) is a standard ERC-20 token, which can be traded on zkSync DEX like SyncSwap, iZumi Finance, veSync. 
veSync($VS) can also be locked to veVS to join protocol governance and vote to different liquidity gauges.
Users' can provide liquidity on veSync to join the yield farming to earn veSync($VS) as a reward. 
veSync($VS) emission rate on different liquidity pool are decided by the voting result on every voting epoch.
